data.title: Spot Bitcoin ETFs Saw $20M Outflow Amid BTC Decline, What's Next?
data.text: Spot Bitcoin ETFs saw a net outflow of over $20 million on July 3, with Grayscale's GBTC leading the exodus. While some funds saw outflows, others attracted new capital, reflecting the diverse strategies and sentiments of investors in the crypto space.

data.title: Crypto Market Crash: Why Bitcoin And Altcoins Are Falling
data.text: Crypto market swings back to bear market as the global crypto market cap has now dropped 20% to a low of $2.15 trillion today. The market cap tumbled more than 4.20% over the last 24 hours.

data.title: Dogecoin Founder Makes Crucial Bitcoin Statement as BTC Plummets
data.text: Billy Markus known on the X social media platform (formerly popular as Twitter) as Shibetoshi Nakamoto, who is a co-founder of the iconic meme cryptocurrency Dogecoin, published a post that sums up his attitude to Bitcoin now as it plummeted well below the $60,000 level once again yesterday.

data.title: Bitcoin Price Could Massively Crash Like In May 2021, Warns Fund Manager
data.text: Bitcoin's price has fallen below the critical support level of $60,000, reaching a low of $57,914. Since Tuesday, Bitcoin has experienced a further 7% decline, reinforcing the ongoing downward trend.

data.title: Will BTC Price Crash Under $56K, $100K A Pipe Dream?
data.text: With the release of Mt. Gox Bitcoins, the broader crypto market has experienced a massive surge in supply pressure. As market analysts expect the supply to continue in the coming days, the crash could continue in the BTC and the altcoins price alike.

data.title: Bitcoin Price Prediction: Bloodbath Confirmed, Next Stop $56,000
data.text: Bitcoin price is currently trading slightly above the crucial $58k levels, leaving everybody surprised with its abrupt dip below the $60k mark. Analyst Josh of Crypto World said that at this moment, there's a reversal signal appearing on the Bitcoin chart. Bitcoin's price is currently retesting a critical support level after encountering resistance, he said.

data.title: Solana Price Forecast: 22% Bullish Comeback in the Offing Amid Bitcoin Meltdown
data.text: Solana price forecast: The price of SOL decreased by 8.4% in the last 24 hours to trade at $136 during European business hours. The price drop may have been influenced by Bitcoin's recent drop below the crucial support level of $60,000, which also affected other cryptocurrencies.

data.text: The current price of Bitcoin is $58,854. This means that the largest crypto by market cap has dropped to its lowest point in two months. This is a very serious development when it comes to the crypto market.

data.title: Bitcoin Could Hit Its Cycle Top in January of 2025, Predicts Crypto Analyst Kevin Svenson – Here's Why
data.text: Cryptocurrency analyst Kevin Svenson is saying that Bitcoin (BTC) could reach its cycle top within the coming months. Svenson tells his 78,600 YouTube subscribers that based on Bitcoin's post-halving behavior over the previous cycles, BTC could hit its cycle top in roughly six months. “So it's [2012] halving, 40 to 80 weeks profit zone.

data.title: Here's How Low Bitcoin Price Can Go? Top Analyst Weighs In
data.text: The cryptocurrency market continues to face turbulence as Bitcoin's price drops by 3.65% intraday and 14.65% over the past month, reaching $58,830 on July 4. Amidst this ongoing decline, prominent crypto analyst Crypto Patel has forecasted an even steeper drop, citing several bearish indicators that suggest Bitcoin could fall as low as $55,000 soon.
